data.eml:eml: A new species of anole related to Anolis altae from Volcán Tenorio, Costa Rica (Reptilia, Squamata, Polychrotidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Köhler, Gunther (2011): A new species of anole related to Anolis altae from Volcán Tenorio, Costa Rica (Reptilia, Squamata, Polychrotidae). Zootaxa 3120: 29-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205375
